member.name: M:Lucene.Net.Search.Highlight.HighlighterTest.TestEncoding
member.summary: Demonstrates creation of an XHTML compliant doc using new encoding facilities.

member.name: T:Lucene.Net.Search.Highlight.SynonymTokenizer
member.summary: Expands a token stream with synonyms (TODO - make the synonyms analyzed by choice of analyzer)
member.author: MAHarwood

member.name: T:Lucene.Net.Search.Highlight.Tokenizer
member.summary: The class performs token processing in strings

members.member: Char representation of the String to tokenize.

member.name: M:Lucene.Net.Search.Highlight.Tokenizer.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new class instance with a specified string to process

member.name: M:Lucene.Net.Search.Highlight.Tokenizer.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new class instance with a specified string to process and the specified token delimiters to use

member.name: M:Lucene.Net.Search.Highlight.Tokenizer.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new class instance with a specified string to process, the specified token delimiters to use, and whether the delimiters must be included in the results.
member.param: Determines if delimiters are included in the results.

member.name: M:Lucene.Net.Search.Highlight.Tokenizer.NextToken
member.summary: Returns the next token from the token list
member.returns: The string value of the token

member.name: M:Lucene.Net.Search.Highlight.Tokenizer.NextToken(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the next token from the source string, using the provided token delimiters
member.param: String containing the delimiters to use
member.returns: The string value of the token

member.name: M:Lucene.Net.Search.Highlight.Tokenizer.HasMoreTokens
member.summary: Determines if there are more tokens to return from the source string
member.returns: True or false, depending if there are more tokens

member.name: P:Lucene.Net.Search.Highlight.Tokenizer.Current
member.summary: Performs the same action as NextToken.
